pullrequest.title: fix memory leak related to Atlas slowing down during cmd_vel teleop

content.raw:
Agree with @scpeters about what is a TEST, Joint_TEST sounds to me more like a tool than a test but the concept of TEST can be wide and not all of them are automatic.

About memory leaks, they appear in a lot of different forms, sometimes it does not break the software under test but make program to fail at any other point. @scpeters what about set up valgrind in jenkins and take care of memory problems in there?
content.html:
Agree with @scpeters about what is a TEST, Joint_TEST sounds to me more like a tool than a test but the concept of TEST can be wide and not all of them are automatic.

About memory leaks, they appear in a lot of different forms, sometimes it does not break the software under test but make program to fail at any other point. @scpeters what about set up valgrind in jenkins and take care of memory problems in there?
